creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Robe of faded mulberry k'ossu very close in design and color to 42.8.69.  Border deeper, but in other respects the two are almost identical, even to the double-happiness characters in the field.  The lining has been removed from this robe, which is slit at the sides.
title: Dragon Robe
